sect1.title: Synopsis
sect1.para: Define some characteristics of the tool such as name or icon and give some information about yourself.

sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: On this page, some characteristics of the tool for the integrated component are defined. Information for the tool user or graphical elements is optional.

Required fields:
Name: This field defines the name of the component. The name is very important, because the tool will be displayed in the workflow editor palette with this name. Note that the name must not contain special characters. Note: Integrating a tool with an already existing tool name will overwrite the configuration of the previous integrated tool.

Optional fields:
Icon Path: An icon for the tool can be selected here. At best, it is larger than 32x32 pixels and has the same width and height. You can select to copy it into the configuration folder, so there is no absolute path link for it any more.
Group Name: This defines the group in the workflow editor palette in which the component will be shown.
Documentation: Here you can choose to add a documentation file for your tool. Note that the file must be a PDF or a TXT document and it must not be greater than 50 MB.
Description: You can provide a description of your tool here, which can be seen by other users when configuring a workflow.
Name/E-Mail: You can provide some contact information about yourself in this field, for example if someone has questions or wants to provide suggestions.
